headline.main: Surgeon General Koop to Resign in July

byline.original: By MARTIN TOLCHIN, Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Dr. C. Everett Koop, who spearheaded attacks against smoking and the AIDS epidemic, announced today that he would resign as Surgeon General of the United States effective July 13.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Dr. C. Everett Koop, who spearheaded attacks against smoking and the AIDS epidemic, announced today that he would resign as Surgeon General of the United States effective July 13.
